title: Share your OWN thoughts on how you'd nerf Kai'Sa, Graves, Irelia, Aatrox, Urgot & Akali
body:

Who knows, this could be a good thread for Rioters to read & take in other peoples' thoughts instead of being in separated rage threads.

The problem is that every champion has different needs and necessities on top of different kits, so each champion could require something different.  For example, to make Garen better we could make his W also include knockback resistance/knockup resistance. Lets him stick to targets more while also being thematically appropriate that he's a massive chunk of soldier that can't easily be moved. 

In terms of junglers, there are tons of ways you can buff junglers to deal with S-tier junglers currently. For example:

A.) Buffing their clear speed. Increased damage of certain spells vs. monsters, slightly lower mana costs on certain abilities, AS boosts to champions who don't necessarily itemize for attack speed (Naut as an example)
B,) Defensive increases against jungle mobs/monsters. Maybe "If shield is broken by a large/epic monster, cooldown is reduced" ala Volibear bite.
C.) Mobility improvements are tricky but you could add better terrain scaling such as "If out of combat, <ability> allows you to go over walls".

In general, those are just real quick ideas that aren't 100% "I would do THIS to fix this champ" but rather rough ideas that could be expanded upon. One of the criticisms i have for Riot's balance is that most balance changes end up being buffs or nerfs to just raw numbers or how much you can use a spell rather than improving/weakening aspects of the spell that _aren't_ just raw damage/CD

I'm also not going to pretend I got the galactic ascended brain to handle that. Riot's got a team for that who know the game better than I do. The thing is I think they can look into buffing characters without necessarily making them do more damage.

- Change/Nerf - Increase values needed for upgrades as she gains upgrades (eg. upgrade E increases W and Q cost by 50%) and buff upgrades to compensate.

Context: With this change, Kaisa can't be a burst, poke, jukey (invisible) adc and is only one or two of those things mid game, 2 or 3 late game. The passive nerf might be enough though.

{{champion:104}} 

- Nerf - E's max armor gain reduced from 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 ---> 30 / 45 / 60 / 75 / 90

Context: Too much free armor.

{{champion:39}} 

- Nerf - Passive base damage reduced from 16 - 68 ---> 16 - 40
- Removed - Total AD ratio (60%)
- Added - Q Bonus AD ratio (70%)
- Buff - Q base damage increased from 5 / 25 / 45 / 65 / 85 ---> 65 / 90 / 115 / 140 / 165 (level 1 value is nearly identical to current value)

Context: Irelia's burst is relatively okay. The issue is that after she bursts she still does extreme overkill amounts of DPS on top of it. I think preserving her skilled ability play over her basic attacks is the better way to go here. Additionally, tanky builds are just too optimal and combined with her W is making her extremely durable in fights. Changing the Q formula from total AD to bonus AD should fix that (or just make weaker tanky Irelias).

{{champion:266}} 

- Nerf - Q cd no longer cools down while in use
- Buff - Q cd is now reduced by 10 / 20 / 30% (Q1/Q2/Q3) when Aatrox strikes an enemy champion with the sweetspot (can only occur once per cast, eg. hitting 2 champions with Q3 still only refunds 30% of the cooldown)
- Buff - Q cd reduced from 16 / 15 / 14 / 13 / 12 ---> 14 / 12.5 / 11 / 9.5 / 8

Context: Aatrox's Q cd is extremely short when spaced out. And when spaced out, it effectively acts as a zoning tool that a good majority of the roster simply can't contest. Instead of rewarding Aatrox for sitting there and using his Q's at the last possible second, he should be rewarded for actually landing them.

Additional Context: Stop stealing Riven's mechanics, ur already half a clone. Be original.

{{champion:6}} 

- Removed - Passive % health damage scaling (was 2% - 8%, is now 2% at all levels)
- Added - Passive now has an additional bonus AD ratio that grants (+1% max health damage per 30 bonus AD)
- Nerf - W shield bonus health ratio reduced from 30% ---> 20%
- Buff - W movement speed debuff now scales down with level (- 125 / 100 / 75) at levels 1/6/11
- Buff - W AD ratio buffed from (+ 20 / 24 / 28 / 32 / 36% AD) ---> (+ 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% AD)

Context: AD/Health Urgot is currently under-performing while full tank Urgot is over-performing. These changes reduce his effectiveness with a near pure tank build and buff his juggernaut build (AD/Health). A big factor to this is that an AD Urgot is easily kited and killed. While that is his intended weakness, it's currently too pronounced which is why full tank with Righteous Glory is the current go-to build. Reducing that debuff over time will allow Urgot to be more flexible in teamfights when not building full defense.

Her W animation is also slow enough for her to proc {{item:3095}} before and after using her W(her W is super quick so she can't use the same trick).
As a Kai'Sa main, I suggest nerfing:
1) Nerfing/Reverting the AP scaling buff on her W, because that's when APC Kai'Sa trend started, and fasten her W's starting animation.
This way her W will have less damage throughout the whole game(late game included) while disabling her the ability to proc {{item:3095}}  before and after W in early game so easily.
2) Decrease the base magic damage of her plasma passive, because with coup de grace mastery she has really high damage in early and mid game, if it still causes problems in late game then adjust her scaling to be tolleratable in late game by having a good damage on hybrid Kai'Sa and full AP Kai'Sa while not dealing disgusting damage on both.
3) Adjust {{item:3095}} by making it even harder to proc it early game by increasing the delay time between two AA's, while nerfing it's damage for lategame. Then I would.find it toleratable.
Kai'Sa was meant to specialize to be versile and be successful on the rift with amy build you'd want go with, not force her to be an AP 3 shot assasin(even tho she is classified as adc/assasin).
Bring the versile Marksman side of her, that is all I want from them to do. And to keep her balanced and a broken most pick or ban champion.
